unnormalised: Flash sales, eh? Reminds me of the Chor Bazaar on a Sunday morning! Gotta be quick, just like in 'Gully Boy'! Sometimes you find a gem, other times, total 'paisa vasool' not. My didi got a sweet deal last Diwali on a saree from Fabindia during a flash sale. Just gotta be careful and read the fine print, warna IIT-ians bhi phas jaate hain!
